is_stone: ^Help me my son. There is so much to tell you but so little time to do it in.

c-0: ^It's the blight, son. The whole village has been turned to stone. The whole village... except for you.
g-0: ^You have a gift, my son. Magic runs through your veins, an old magic. A great magic. You have the power inside you to turn us back to our human forms.
g-1: ^There's an object you must find. It's a very powerful gemstone. You'll know it when you see it. Go. Now.

is_awake: ^Oh, my son. Thank you so much for freeing me. We don't have much time and you must be on your way. I'm sure you've got plenty of questions. I'll only have time to answer a few..
^What do you know about the Wizard Saints?

c-0: ^It's happening to you because you're special, my son. I know every parent thinks their child is special, but you actually are. Since you were born, strange things have happened around you. It took us some time, but we eventually realized that it was you causing it. We don't know how or why, but you have access to a great magic, son. Use it wisely.
c-1: ^Stories say that when God Emperor Magnus died, his power didn't die with him - it left his body in search of a new host. The power entered the first living creature it encountered - a tiny mouse. The mouse wasn't strong enough to contain this great power, and it exploded - shattering God Emperor's power in the process. Each of these avatar stones are a piece of his power that you can unlock and take within you and use.
c-2: ^Not much, my son. The Wizard Saints are very powerful, quite nearly immortal beings. The Wizard Saint Moro Storm-Tamer lives in the castle nearby. It's said that he can control storms and even causes the seasons to change. When Moro's angry, it's said that crops will fail and the harvest will be poor. We try very hard not to anger him.

is_stone: ^Haha this feels weird. Am I going to be stuck like this forever?

s: ^Of course not! I'll save you, baby bro!

c-0: ^Oh no! I don't want to be a statue forever!
c-1: ^Thank god. I don't want to be a statue forever!
c-2: ^You're the best, big bro! I knew you'd help me...
